articles.description: Watch & follow live updates of from Tyson Fury vs Oleksandr Usyk press conference from Riyadh, Saudi Arabia before their heavyweight fight.
articles.title: Fury vs Usyk 2 press conference LIVE: Watch stream and follow text updates

articles.description: The Friedkin Group completes its majority takeover of Everton, ending the turbulent tenure of Farhad Moshiri.
articles.title: Everton takeover: Friedkin Group completes deal to end Farhad Moshiri tenure

articles.description: The legendary spinner shocked the cricket world on Wednesday with his sudden retirement.
articles.title: Ravichandran Ashwin: A spin legend who redefined Indian cricket

articles.description: BBC Sport columnist Nedum Onuoha explains why Manchester United forward Marcus Rashford has always been judged differently to other players.
articles.title: Marcus Rashford: Why Man Utd star is 'lightning rod for criticism'

articles.description: Premier League strugglers Wolves appoint former Porto boss Vitor Pereira as their new head coach.
articles.title: Wolves: Vitor Pereira appointed new head coach of Premier League strugglers

articles.description: New Zealander Liam Lawson will race for Red Bull alongside Max Verstappen following the team's decision to ditch Sergio Perez.
articles.title: Liam Lawson to replace Sergio Perez at Red Bull in 2025

articles.description: Angry gamblers are behind 48% of the 12,000 social media posts that have abused tennis players this year, says an AI-led detection system.
articles.title: Social media abuse in tennis: Gamblers send 48% of offensive messages

articles.description: India will play its matches at the 2025 Champions Trophy in Pakistan at a neutral venue, the International Cricket Council has announced.
articles.title: India to play Champions Trophy matches at neutral venue

articles.description: Lord Coe says he would be open to the possibility of moving some indoor sports from the summer Olympics to the winter Games if he becomes the new president of the IOC.
articles.title: Lord Sebastian Coe open to moving summer sports to winter Olympics

articles.description: SFA head of referee operations Willie Collum says VAR made a ''really, really poor'' and "unacceptable" decision not to award Rangers a penalty against Celtic in Sunday's Scottish League Cup final.
articles.title: Willie Collum: Rangers penalty decision in final against Celtic 'unacceptable'
